name: LS Garage
description:
LS Garage is the multiplayer mobile game about customizing classic
soviet cars.
LS Garage will be available in App Store and Google play.
The game is all about russian tuning and custom culture. The aim is to build the car, that will get the biggest respect and win ‘Car of the day’ award.
We've created detailed constructor and exciting online style battles. Release soon!
Notice! Login in demo version on this page via FB or Google may cause account security warning. It's ok because this build is working on emulated android device, don't worry!
Community page: https://vk.com/lsgplay
Have fun and stay tuned!
